i1.name: Power_Chord
description: {{sbc|Innate - Melody:}} '''Sona's''' basic [[Champion ability|abilities]] each generate a unique [[aura]] for 3 seconds that empowers her and all targetable allied {{tip|champions}} who enter its radius, and casting them places her other basic abilities that are not on cooldown on a {{fd|0.5}}-second cooldown.

{{sbc|Innate - Power Chord:}} After casting 3 basic abilities, '''Sona's''' next [[basic attack]] has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}, deals {{as|{{pp|20 to 90 for 8;90 to 240|formula=10 + 10 per level until level 8, then + 15 per level}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and applies an additional effect depending on the last basic ability cast.
Gaining ''Power Chord's'' empowered attack {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Sona's''' basic attack timer.

{{sbc|Innate - Accelerando:}} '''Sona''' gains a stack of ''Accelerando'' each time she hits an enemy with {{ai|Hymn of Valor|Sona}} or supports an ally with {{ai|Aria of Perseverance|Sona}}, stacking up to 120 times. Each stack grants her {{fd|0.5}} [[Ability_haste#Increasing_basic_ability_haste|basic ability haste]], up to 60 basic ability haste at maximum stacks. If she has maximum stacks, the '''current''' {{sti|cooldown}} of {{ai|Crescendo|Sona}} is reduced by {{fd|1.5}} seconds each time instead.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Melody: Sona's basic Champion ability each generate a unique aura for 3 seconds that empowers her and all targetable allied champions who enter its radius, and casting them places her other basic abilities that are not on cooldown on a 0.5-second cooldown.
Innate - Power Chord: After casting 3 basic abilities, Sona's next basic attack has an uncancelable windup, deals 20undefined − 90 for 8;90undefined (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage and applies an additional effect depending on the last basic ability cast.
Gaining Power Chord's empowered attack resets Sona's basic attack timer.
Innate - Accelerando: Sona gains a stack of Accelerando each time she hits an enemy with Sona's Hymn of Valor or supports an ally with Sona's Aria of Perseverance, stacking up to 120 times. Each stack grants her 0.5 Ability_haste#Increasing_basic_ability_haste, up to 60 basic ability haste at maximum stacks. If she has maximum stacks, the current cooldown of Sona's Crescendo is reduced by 1.5 seconds each time instead.
i1.notes:
* '''Sona''' has a stack counter under her health-bar that is not visible to other champions.
** When ''Power Chord'' is ready, Sona gains a ring around her. This ring will have a different color depending on the last ability used (''{{ai|Hymn of Valor|Sona|blue}}, {{ai|Aria of Perseverance|Sona|green}} or {{ai|Song of Celerity|Sona|purple}}'').
** The effect does not change if abilities are used while the projectile is in motion.
* The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* '''Sona''' retains ''Power Chord's'' stacks when entering {{tip|resurrection}}.

q1.name: Hymn_of_Valor
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' sends out bolts of sound to the two nearest visible enemies, prioritizing champions, each dealing {{as|magic damage}} to their target upon arrival.
{{sbc|Melody:}} '''Sona''' and tagged allied champions deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} on their next basic attack within 5 seconds.
'''Sona''' gains a stack of ''Accelerando'' for each bolt that damages an enemy champion.

{{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord|Sona}} – Staccato:}} ''Power Chord'' deals {{as|{{pp|20*1.4 to 90*1.4 for 8;90*1.4 to 240*1.4|formula=14 + 14 per level until level 8, then + 21 per level}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 28% AP)}} {{as|'''total''' magic damage}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sona sends out bolts of sound to the two nearest visible enemies, prioritizing champions, each dealing magic damage to their target upon arrival.
Melody: Sona and tagged allied champions deal bonus magic damage on their next basic attack within 5 seconds.
Sona gains a stack of Accelerando for each bolt that damages an enemy champion.
Sona's Power Chord – Staccato: Power Chord deals 20*1.4undefined − 90*1.4 for 8;90*1.4undefined (based on level) (+ 28% AP) total magic damage.

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 20% AP)

w1.name: Aria_of_Perseverance
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' {{tip|heals}} herself and sends out a tone to heal the {{tt|most wounded|Based on greatest % missing health}} nearby allied champion.
{{sbc|Melody:}} '''Sona''' and tagged allied champions receive a {{tip|shield}} lasting up to {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
'''Sona''' gains a stack of ''Accelerando'' whenever she {{tip|heals}} a wounded ally or {{tip|shields}} a minimum amount of damage for an ally with ''Aria of Perseverance''.
{{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord|Sona}} – Diminuendo:}} ''Power Chord'' reduces its target's [[size]] by 8% and damage output by 25% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} for 3 seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sona heals herself and sends out a tone to heal the most wounded nearby allied champion.
Melody: Sona and tagged allied champions receive a shield lasting up to 1.5 seconds.
Sona gains a stack of Accelerando whenever she heals a wounded ally or shields a minimum amount of damage for an ally with Aria of Perseverance.
Sona's Power Chord – Diminuendo: Power Chord reduces its target's size by 8% and damage output by 25% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 3 seconds.
w1.notes:
* If no one is injured, ''Aria of Perseverance'' will target the closest allied champion.
* The projectile of ''Aria of Perseverance'' will follow an ally in stealth but will not reveal them.

e1.name: Song_of_Celerity
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' gains {{as|20%|ms}} {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 3 seconds, extended to up to 7 seconds if she doesn't take damage.
{{sbc|Melody:}} Tagged allied champions gain {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} for 3 seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord|Sona}} – Tempo:}} ''Power Chord'' {{tip|slow|slows}} its target by 40% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} for 2 seconds, capped at a maximum of 99%.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sona gains 20% (+ 2% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed for 3 seconds, extended to up to 7 seconds if she doesn't take damage.
Melody: Tagged allied champions gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.
Sona's Power Chord – Tempo: Power Chord slows its target by 40% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 2 seconds, capped at a maximum of 99%.
leveling: {{st|Aura Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|10 to 14}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}}}}
e1.notes: * To achieve a 99% {{tip|slow}} with the empowered attack via {{ai|Power Chord|Sona}}, it would require at least {{as|1475 AP}}.

effects.str: • Aura Bonus Movement Speed: % (+ 2% per 100 AP)

r1.name: Crescendo
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' plays an irresistible chord in a line in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within its path and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them by forcing them to dance for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Sona plays an irresistible chord in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies within its path and stunning them by forcing them to dance for 1.5 seconds.
